Discussions.Discussion_Name: Lecture time, place, dates and grading

Messages.Author: Felix Sebastian Creutzig
Messages.Content: Dear all, the lecture will take place every Monday 9.15am-10.45am at Mercator Research Institute on Global Commons and Climate Change. Please find the location here. Note that I will open you the door, so please be there at 9.15am sharp. First lecture is on April 22nd. Other lecture dates are: April 29th May 6th May 20th June 3rd June 17th July 8th July 15th There will be videolectures provided online that are mandatory to watch and follow through. To obtain a graded seminar certificate, you need to a) attend all lectures (one exception possible) b) understand the content and engage in discussions c) write a short paper on a specified topic (tbc). Looking forward to meeting you on April 22nd. Best wishes, Felix
